name: Sub machine beans
description:
Go in fullscreen for the best experience

It's a normal day in the city until suddenly, the beans have decided to fight back! Grab your SMG and fight back but don't get turned into one.

Note that the game is still a work in progress. The game is most likely going to improve as time goes on. Such as map and model improvements.

If the web version does not work, please download the game.
